title: Can AI Generate more Comprehensive Test Scenarios? Review on Automated Driving Systems Test Scenario Generation Methods
summary: Ensuring the safety and reliability of Automated Driving Systems (ADS) remains a critical challenge, as traditional verification methods such as large-scale on-road testing are prohibitively costly and time-consuming.To address this,scenario-based testing has emerged as a scalable and efficient alternative,yet existing surveys provide only partial coverage of recent methodological and technologica
